front.title: The use case in Edge Datacenter network

abstract.t: This document introduce the Edge Datacentet network, and describe some use cases about Edge Datacenter, discuss an important component in the Edge Datacenter:Service Gateway and its functions. Service Gateway as a flow distribution device in the Edge DC network, it needs to not only play a gateway of the edge Datacenter network, implementing coordination with existing technology,but also meets many new requirements. For example, acts as a traffic distributor to make sure the packets goes into Edge DC or Metro network, SDN forwarding, and as a leaf in the leaf-spin architecture.
